resources.string:
Welcome to Sensors2PD!

Create your patch using desired receivers, upload to your SDcard and load using Browse menu option.

Look at the Guide menu option if you want any help.

Guide:

On creating your Pure Data patch you can use any of the receivers from available sensors to interact with your patch.

Example:
If you have Accelerometer available, your device will send float values using
 [s sensor1v0],
 [s sensor1v1],
 [s sensor1v2].
Then you can create receivers for these sensors and use the values on your patch.

Touch screen sensors are also available from [s sensorT0vx] to [s sensorT14vx], and [sensorT14vy] to [s sensorT14vy].

Check available sensors below and thanks for using Sensors2PD.
